House Bill/Resolution NO. PS00060
FULL TITLE : NEED TO STRENGTHEN THE CAPABILITIES OF LOCAL COMMUNITIES TO FIGHT TERRORISM AND LAWLESSNESS IN THE LIGHT OF THE DAVAO CITY BOMBING
SHORT TITLE : Night Market Bombing In Davao City
ABSTRACT : Rep. Nograles spoke on the Davao City bombing last September 2, 2016 which killed 14 innocent civilians and seriously wounded 67 others...; stressed that they cannot live in fear and made a challenge to let their fears be swept away by the strength of their collective moral outrage and fortify their resolve, as individual citizens and as a nation, to fight against all forms of lawlessness, criminality and terrorism...; noted that the President, who is a true son of Davao, has issued the strongest call to arms against lawlessness in the wake of said bombing by declaring a state of lawless violence and for such purpose, has mobilized the full force of the armed forces and the police, and has been exhorting the citizenry to take part in the war against criminality and lawlessness...; stated that he filed House Resolution No. 302 condemning the bombing of the Roxas Night Market in Davao City, and expressing the resolve of the House to undertake appropriate actions to strengthen the capabilities of local communities to fight terrorism and lawlessness,...(SOURCE: House Journal No.18,p.11)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NOGRALES, KARLO ALEXEI B.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Speech-Privilege Hour
REMARKS: Interpellations by Reps. Roque H., Atienza, Alejano, Lobrega and Dimaporo M.; Manifestations by Reps. Hernandez F.and Zarate.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY ON 2016-09-14
